name: 8-bit Doomsday
description:
Objective

Survive the alien invasion as long as you can. The more ships and asteroids you destroy in the process the better your score.

Controls

Escape or P: Pause / Settings.

W or Up Arrow Key: Accelerate forward.

S or Down Arrow Key: Accelerate backwards.

A or Left Arrow Key: Rotate to the Left

D or Right Arrow Key: Rotate to the Right

Shift or LMB: Shoot machine gun.

Space or RMB: Shoot rockets.
